params._bio: Biography or description of the venue.
params._latitude: Geographic latitude coordinate of the venue.
params._longitude: Geographic longitude coordinate of the venue.
params._streetAddress: Physical street address of the venue.

params._venueId: Unique identifier of the venue to be deregistered.

returns.bio: Biography or description of the venue.
returns.latitude: Geographic latitude coordinate of the venue.
returns.longitude: Geographic longitude coordinate of the venue.
returns.name: Name of the venue.
returns.streetAddress: Physical street address of the venue.
returns.wallet: Wallet address associated with the venue.

returns._0: VenueInfo Struct containing all relevant data of the venue.

params.venueAddress: Address of the venue to check.

returns._0: bool True if the venue is registered, false otherwise.

params.nominee: Address of the venue being nominated.

params.newURI: New URI to set for the artist token.

params.tokenId: Token ID for which to set the new URI.

params._bio: New biography or description of the venue.
params._latitude: New latitude coordinate for the venue.
params._longitude: New longitude coordinate for the venue.
params._streetAddress: New physical address of the venue.
params._totalCapacity: New maximum capacity figure for the venue.
params._wallet: New wallet address associated with the venue.

acceptNomination(string,string,int256,in.notice: Allows a nominated venue to accept its nomination and register.

deregisterVenue(uint256).notice: Deregisters a venue from the registry.

getVenue(address).notice: Retrieves venue information by wallet address.

getVenueById(uint256).notice: Retrieves venue information by its unique identifier.

isVenueRegistered(address).notice: Checks if a venue is registered in the registry by its address.

nominate(address).notice: Nominates a new venue for registration using a referral credit.

setContractURI(string).notice: Updates the metadata URI for the contract.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets a new URI for a specified token, updating the metadata link.

updateVenue(uint256,string,string,addres.notice: Updates the profile information of a registered venue.
